transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji Sarojini India living baat kar rahi hai Ranchi se.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Sir Kunal ji se baat kar rahe hain Kunal.
Customer: Ji bol raha hun.
Executive: Bol rahe hain. Ha sir Saurabh baat kar raha tha India Mart ke office se business plan ke baat kar raha tha kaisa hai?
Customer: Ha ha baat to hui thi thoda der pehle.
Executive: Ji ji ji actually aap logo ka na ek feedback aaya tha regarding the employee to main janna chah raha tha ki sir kuch issue aap face kar rahe hain services ko lekar aap mujhe batayega help kar paunga kya issue aa raha tha?
Customer: Ab issue ye aa raha hai ki.
Executive: Aapne mention kiya ki higher package bol raha hai koi aapko lene ke liye aisa kuch hai.
Customer: Ha dekhiye baat kya hai na ki mere ko leads sahi nahi aa rahi hai maine unko complain kiya do char bar complain hua baat bhi hui.
Customer: Aur ki bar bar set karke de rahe hain mere ko theek hai na lekin leads jo aa rahi hai mere ko jo mere catalog hai wo us regarding koi bhi leads nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Matlab jis cheez mein kam karta hu wo leads nahi aa rahi ye mere kehna hai.
Executive: Achcha matlab ye jo product aap deal kar rahe hain un product se related leads aapko nahi mil rahi jis vajah se issue face kar rahe hain aap right?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: To main aapko suggestion main chahunga chota sa agar possible ho sake to aapke pass jab aap lead consume karte hain na to waha par aap logo ke pass option aata hai irrelevant mark karne ka.
Executive: Koshish kijiyega to jo bhi irrelevant ka mark hai right us par aap click karke jis product mein aap deal nahi karte ya jo bhi aapka relevancy ka reason hai right wo feedback aap jarur waha se dale.
Customer: Samajh gaye.
Executive: Dekhiye customer ka conversion hona na hona ek different cheez hai right leads relevant aana ek different cheez hai to leads ka kya hai ki jab aap feedback ye share karte hain to jo hamare piche se AI based hai apna lead allocation ka right wo automatically aap logo ke pass leads allocate honi shuru ho jayegi usse related jo aap feedback dete hain uske basis pe wo basically backend se lead share hoti hai ha aapke catalog pe jo working related kam hai jaise keywords add hona right M cat add hona aapke product se related synonyms add hona right wo yaha se account manager manage kar sakta hai aur rahi baat aapne ek cheez mention kari ki wo aap se higher package lene ke liye kuch bol rahe the right sir wo just ek suggestion hai it is not mandatory ki aap lo hi lo and it is not like ki aap na lo at least aap hamare customer hain to aapko pata hona chahiye ki chal kya raha hai market mein to is vajah se aapko suggestion diya hoga to it is not like that ki aap wo package lenge to matlab cheeze change hongi by lead is something sir aap koi bhi package lijiye right by lead hamara same hi milega aapke feedback ke basis pe aapka purchase pattern ke basis pe right aapki recommendation automatically by lead usi hisab se aapke pass jati hai sir agar aap mere se 25000 ka chota package le lenge sir 28000 wala basic service ka right ya aap 20 lakh ka package le lijiye agar mere pass 50 lead hai aapki industry mein to wo 50 ki hai aur wo MDC wale ko bhi 50 dikhaunga star wale ko bhi 50 dikhaunga right ab depend karega ki star wale ko humne capacity jyada di hogi 72 lead consume karne ki right aapko humne 17 lead consume karne ki capacity di hogi right to usse by lead ka koi lena dena nahi hota by lead jo aayegi wo portal pe aapko jarur dikhegi.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Nahi to mera bhi ek suggestion mera ye bhi kehna tha ki jis regarding mein matlab main product mein deal karta hu wo market se khatam ho gaya hai kya jis karan se nahi nahi market ko pata nahi hai.
Executive: Aapka main product matlab aap kya expect karte hain jo aapko chahiye jiski leads aapko chahiye aap mujhe bataiye ek bar.
Customer: Jaise UPVC metal clamp hai.
Executive: UPVC metal clamp hai.
Customer: UPVC metal clamp aapne bataya right ab jaise main yaha dekh raha hu mere pass aapki construction ke basis pe dikha raha hai ek GI pipe clamp hota hai GI saddle clamp hota hai ek metal clamp ek CPVC clamp right ek pipe clamp karke ye che product hai jisme aap sabse jyada by lead consume karna prefer karte hain sabse jyada GI pipe clamp ki by lead consume karna prefer karte hain right sir aur jo India Mart ke matlab jo mere pass samne aata hai wo main consume karne ki koshish karta hu lekin jo main deal kar raha hu wo bhi wo nahi aa rahi hai pehle golden iron clamp se kam karta tha wo bhi nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Main aapko ek cheez share karta hu aap apna whatsapp number ek batayenge sir.
Customer: Ha likhiye na.
Executive: Boliye.
Customer: 8709.
Customer: 8709963.
Customer: 43.
Customer: 431.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Dekhiye sir maine aapko ek message bheja hai hello sir karke aaya aayega just now abhi abhi whatsapp kiya hai maine.
Customer: Ek minute sir call aa raha hai main phone pe.
Executive: Hanji hanji kar lijiye koi baat nahi.
(silence)
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant leads.

- Receiving calls for higher packages.



Resolution:

- Suggested marking irrelevant leads to improve allocation.

- Clarified higher package is just a suggestion.

- Explained by-leads are same for all packages.



Next Steps: 

- Executive sent a WhatsApp message.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, irrelevant leads, packages
